means: <正>给…添麻烦，使不方便，使为难

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年新GRE考试新增词汇（1）_新东方网 ... dire a. 可怕的 discommode v. 使不方便, 使为难 discombobulated a. 混乱的,骚动的.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... discombobulate 扰乱>调解 discommode 使为难>施恩惠 disconcert 使仓皇失措>安抚.
蓝宝词典 ... discomfit v. 使窘迫；使沮丧 discommode v. 使不便；打扰 discompose vt. 使不安，使烦乱.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... perturbation n． 烦乱，扰乱 | discommode v 使烦恼，扰乱 flutter v n 摆动,鼓翼,烦扰 |.

list.abs: I discommode the ground to cry to shout to father : " Don't learn , don't learn , too dangerous ! "我委屈地对爸爸哭喊着：“不学了，不学了，太危险了！”
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... discommodiousness 不方便 discommodity 不便 discommon 据为私有地.
We were discommoded by his late arrival., 他的迟到给我们添了麻烦.
I discommode the ground to cry to shout to father : " Don't learn , don't learn , too dangerous ! "我委屈地对爸爸哭喊着：“不学了，不学了，太危险了！”

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from obsolete French discommoder, variant of incommoder (see incommode)

means.word_mean: 1. to cause inconvenience or discomfort to;

auth_sentence.content: In their handsome house...her presence...would discommode nobody.
auth_sentence.res_content: In their handsome house...her presence...would discommode nobody.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In their handsome house...her presence...would discommode nobody.

means.word_mean: <正>给…添麻烦;使不方便,使为难

sentences.en: We were discommoded by his late arrival.
sentences.cn: 他的迟到给我们添了麻烦。
